questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Pets and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A cat playing with toys
B) A cat wrapped in blankets
C) A cat eating food
D) A cat exploring outdoors

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The background scenery
B) The cat wrapped in blankets
C) The furniture
D) The lighting

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A plant
B) A cat wrapped in blankets
C) A piece of furniture
D) A window

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A busy street
B) A wall and some pillows
C) A garden
D) A bookshelf

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A table
B) A cat wrapped in blankets
C) A vase of flowers
D) A television

How is the cat positioned in the photo?
A) Standing
B) Sitting upright
C) Lying down and wrapped in blankets
D) Jumping

What type of blankets are visible in the photo?
A) Woolen blankets
B) Quilts
C) Fleece blankets
D) Electric blankets

What is the cat's expression in the photo?
A) Happy and playful
B) Sleepy and relaxed
C) Scared and alert
D) Angry and aggressive

What colors dominate the blankets in the photo?
A) Bright and colorful
B) Muted and neutral
C) Dark and bold
D) Pastel shades

What is the texture of the blankets in the photo?
A) Rough and coarse
B) Soft and fluffy
C) Smooth and silky
D) Hard and rigid

A) The cat looks uncomfortable
B) The cat looks very comfortable and cozy
C) The cat looks indifferent
D) The cat looks ready to play

What is the lighting like in the photo?
A) Bright and sunny
B) Dim and moody
C) Soft and natural
D) Dark and shadowy

What is the cat's fur color?
A) Black
B) White
C) Gray
D) Orange

Where is the cat's head positioned?
A) Tucked under its body
B) Resting on the blankets
C) Elevated above the blankets
D) Hidden from view

What kind of setting is depicted in the photo?
A) Outdoor garden
B) Indoor living space
C) Office environment
D) Public park

What mood does the photo convey?
A) Excitement and energy

C) Tension and stress

A) Toys
B) Food bowls

D) Books

A) Playing with a toy

What is the overall color scheme of the photo?

D) Colorful and vibrant

A) Alert and standing
B) Curled up and resting
C) Sitting upright
D) Stretching
